name: QSpell
description:
Magician fights noise with hands.

Try to grow the size of the wheel by manipulating time and space with your hands. And also your mouse or keyboard (A,D, up, down). 

Simulation is controlled by the Quantum Black Box. https://gitlab.utu.fi/matros/quantum-black-box

Enemies will approach you and steal your scorepoints, put them on the wheel before that.

Secret key combination enables hands.
